ayahs.textUthmani: أَلَمْ تَكُنْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَلَمْ [Were not] تَكُنْ [Were not] ءَايَـٰتِى [My Verses] تُتْلَىٰ [recited] عَلَيْكُمْ [to you] فَكُنتُم [and you used (to)] بِهَا [deny them] تُكَذِّبُونَ [deny them]
ayahs.transliteration: Alam takun ayatee tutlaAAalaykum fakuntum biha tukaththiboon

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتْ عَلَيْنَا شِقْوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوْمًا ضَآلِّينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالُوا۟ [They (will) say] رَبَّنَا [Our Lord] غَلَبَتْ [Overcame] عَلَيْنَا [[on] us] شِقْوَتُنَا [our wretchedness] وَكُنَّا [and we were] قَوْمًۭا [a people] ضَآلِّينَ [astray]
ayahs.transliteration: Qaloo rabbana ghalabatAAalayna shiqwatuna wakunna qawman dalleen

ayahs.textUthmani: رَبَّنَآ أَخْرِجْنَا مِنْهَا فَإِنْ عُدْنَا فَإِنَّا ظَـٰلِمُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: رَبَّنَآ [Our Lord] أَخْرِجْنَا [Bring us out] مِنْهَا [from it] فَإِنْ [then if] عُدْنَا [we return] فَإِنَّا [then indeed, we] ظَـٰلِمُونَ [(would be) wrongdoers]
ayahs.transliteration: Rabbana akhrijna minhafa-in AAudna fa-inna thalimoon

ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He (will) say] ٱخْسَـُٔوا۟ [Remain despised] فِيهَا [in it] وَلَا [and (do) not] تُكَلِّمُونِ [speak to Me]

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَرِيقٌ مِّنْ عِبَادِى يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا وَٱرْحَمْنَا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed] كَانَ [(there) was] فَرِيقٌۭ [a party] مِّنْ [of] عِبَادِى [My slaves] يَقُولُونَ [(who) said] رَبَّنَآ [Our Lord] ءَامَنَّا [We believe] فَٱغْفِرْ [so forgive] لَنَا [us] وَٱرْحَمْنَا [and have mercy on us] وَأَنتَ [and You] خَيْرُ [(are) best] ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ [(of) those who show mercy]
ayahs.transliteration: Innahu kana fareequn min AAibadeeyaqooloona rabbana amanna faghfirlana warhamna waanta khayru arrahimeen

ayahs.textUthmani: فَٱتَّخَذْتُمُوهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا حَتَّىٰٓ أَنسَوْكُمْ ذِكْرِى وَكُنتُم مِّنْهُمْ تَضْحَكُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَٱتَّخَذْتُمُوهُمْ [But you took them] سِخْرِيًّا [(in) mockery] حَتَّىٰٓ [until] أَنسَوْكُمْ [they made you forget] ذِكْرِى [My remembrance] وَكُنتُم [and you used (to)] مِّنْهُمْ [at them] تَضْحَكُونَ [laugh]
ayahs.transliteration: Fattakhathtumoohumsikhriyyan hatta ansawkum thikree wakuntumminhum tadhakoon

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنِّى جَزَيْتُهُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنِّى [Indeed, I] جَزَيْتُهُمُ [have rewarded them] ٱلْيَوْمَ [this Day] بِمَا [because] صَبَرُوٓا۟ [they were patient] أَنَّهُمْ [indeed, they] هُمُ [[they]] ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ [(are) the successful ones]
ayahs.transliteration: Innee jazaytuhumu alyawma bima sabarooannahum humu alfa-izoon

ayahs.textUthmani: قَـٰلَ كَمْ لَبِثْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَـٰلَ [He will say] كَمْ [How long] لَبِثْتُمْ [did you remain] فِى [in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] عَدَدَ [(in) number] سِنِينَ [(of) years]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala kam labithtum fee al-ardiAAadada sineen

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالُوا۟ لَبِثْنَا يَوْمًا أَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْمٍ فَسْـَٔلِ ٱلْعَآدِّينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالُوا۟ [They will say] لَبِثْنَا [We remained] يَوْمًا [a day] أَوْ [or] بَعْضَ [a part] يَوْمٍۢ [(of) a day] فَسْـَٔلِ [but ask] ٱلْعَآدِّينَ [those who keep count]
ayahs.transliteration: Qaloo labithna yawman aw baAAdayawmin fas-ali alAAaddeen

ayahs.textUthmani: قَـٰلَ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا ۖ لَّوْ أَنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَـٰلَ [He will say] إِن [Not] لَّبِثْتُمْ [you stayed] إِلَّا [but] قَلِيلًۭا ۖ [a little] لَّوْ [if] أَنَّكُمْ [only you] كُنتُمْ [[you]] تَعْلَمُونَ [knew]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala in labithtum illaqaleelan law annakum kuntum taAAlamoon

ayahs.textUthmani: أَفَحَسِبْتُمْ أَنَّمَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ عَبَثًا وَأَنَّكُمْ إِلَيْنَا لَا تُرْجَعُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَفَحَسِبْتُمْ [Then did you think] أَنَّمَا [that] خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ [We created you] عَبَثًۭا [uselessly] وَأَنَّكُمْ [and that you] إِلَيْنَا [to Us] لَا [not] تُرْجَعُونَ [will be returned]
ayahs.transliteration: Afahasibtum annama khalaqnakumAAabathan waannakum ilayna la turjaAAoon

ayahs.textUthmani: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَتَعَـٰلَى [So exalted is] ٱللَّهُ [Allah] ٱلْمَلِكُ [the King] ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ [the Truth] لَآ [(There is) no] إِلَـٰهَ [god] إِلَّا [except] هُوَ [Him] رَبُّ [(the) Lord] ٱلْعَرْشِ [(of) the Throne] ٱلْكَرِيمِ [Honorable]
ayahs.transliteration: FataAAala Allahualmaliku alhaqqu la ilaha illa huwarabbu alAAarshi alkareem

ayahs.textUthmani: وَمَن يَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرْهَـٰنَ لَهُۥ بِهِۦ فَإِنَّمَا حِسَابُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَمَن [And whoever] يَدْعُ [invokes] مَعَ [with] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] إِلَـٰهًا [god] ءَاخَرَ [other] لَا [no] بُرْهَـٰنَ [proof] لَهُۥ [for him] بِهِۦ [in it] فَإِنَّمَا [Then only] حِسَابُهُۥ [his account] عِندَ [(is) with] رَبِّهِۦٓ ۚ [his Lord] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, [he]] لَا [not] يُفْلِحُ [will succeed] ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ [the disbelievers]
ayahs.transliteration: Waman yadAAu maAAa Allahi ilahanakhara la burhana lahu bihi fa-innamahisabuhu AAinda rabbihi innahu la yuflihualkafiroon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ وَٱرْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَقُل [And say] رَّبِّ [My Lord] ٱغْفِرْ [Forgive] وَٱرْحَمْ [and have mercy] وَأَنتَ [and You] خَيْرُ [(are the) Best] ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ [(of) those who show mercy]
ayahs.transliteration: Waqul rabbi ighfir warhamwaanta khayru arrahimeen
